attributes.review: as a fellow trump supporter 🧚 i felt it very necessary to download this app as it would keep me up to date on his information and details regarding his campaign. LITTLE DID I KNOW THAT THIS IS THE WORST APP IN THE APP STORE. I HAVE NEVER WITNESSED OR EXPERIENCED AN APP MORE FRUSTRATING THAN THIS ONE !!!! it is terribly designed !! every time i go onto this app it glitches and brings me back to my home page. Also the app tends to cause my phone to be FROZEN AND NOT WORK !!!!  it just displays a blank page and my home buttons and everything don’t work !!! my only way to get my phone to work again is to restart it !! very disappointed although i reallly wanted to support trump i just cannot deal with all the bugs and all the scamming going on within the app. i believe they might have stole my information !!!!!!!! -1000/100 please get rid of this app from the app store, would hate for others to experience these issues !
attributes.title: really poorly designed app !!

attributes.review: I downloaded this for a Beautiful ✨Orange✨ President who is definitely not a rapist and racist and homophobic but turns out it hacked my phone and now I’m getting emails from are lovely vice president about ✨butt s*x ✨ so that was weird do not download

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support the Great 🍊orange🍊 it was a complete  accident.the app started to crashing so as usually I turned off my phone.i open it back and there is Trump in my screen telling me to come to the White House I kept saying why he kept saying I want to see your body,I was soo scared I’m only a kid 😭🥺, then he told me to be racist against anyone who is not white I told him that I am black.he goes well I got a farm you could work At 😐 I was sooo mad.do I deleted the app but it kept reinstalling itself DO not DOWNLOAD 🙄😡

Download Subway Surfers instead plz ✨✨✨
